result.arabic_text: طَاعَةٞ وَقَوۡلٞ مَّعۡرُوفٞۚ فَإِذَا عَزَمَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ فَلَوۡ صَدَقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيۡرٗا لَّهُمۡ
result.translation: 21. Yallih amri oggolaanaah, meqe maxcot yaabaanama. Amri yiggiriqqeeh, jihaad (gaadi) madqime waqdii munaafiqhiin tinqibeh, tokkel Yalla nummaysaanam diggah keenih aysukten Yallih amri cinaanamak.
